  • Formatting and using with template

    • Formatting and using with template

    To get the most out of Document Librarian, you'll want to load a .docx file that uses this app's standard template.

    To do that is simple, just start every new entry in the document file with:

  • LABEL:
  • DATE:
  • TITLE:
  • CONTENT:

    • This will allow the algorithm to accurately search and pull sections of the document based on their content.

    Using without template

    Document Librarian can also be used on an unformatted document as a simple search tool.
